entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who is hurrying out into the pitch-darkness with Harry. He is described as quickening his pace and taking longer strides.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is hurrying along beside Dumbledore. He is concerned about Mr. Crouch's behavior and mentions that he left him with Viktor Krum.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is mentioned as a person who Harry left Mr. Crouch with. Dumbledore asks if anybody else saw Mr. Crouch.

entities.name: mr. crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is mentioned as a person who is acting strangely and doesn't seem to know where he is. Harry mentions that he left him with Viktor Krum.

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: Percy Weasley is mentioned as someone Mr. Crouch thinks is there, but it's actually Dumbledore.

entities.name: mr. bagman
entities.description: Mr. Bagman is mentioned as a person who had just finished telling Harry and Viktor Krum about the third task.

relationships.description: Harry is accompanying Dumbledore through the darkness.
Harry was talking to Viktor Krum when they saw Mr. Crouch coming out of the forest.
Dumbledore is concerned about Mr. Crouch's behavior and asks if anybody else saw him.
Harry left Mr. Crouch with Viktor Krum.
